Package com.group12.service

Class PasswordResetService

java.lang.Object
com.group12.service.PasswordResetService
@Service public class PasswordResetService extends Object
Service class for password reset functionality This service provides methods for creating a password reset token for a user, sending a password reset email, and validating the password reset token.

  • Constructor Details

    • PasswordResetService

      @Autowired public PasswordResetService(org.springframework.mail.javamail.JavaMailSender mailSender, PasswordResetTokenRepository tokenRepository)
      Constructs a new PasswordResetService with specified mail sender and token repository.
      Parameters:
      mailSender - the JavaMailSender used for sending emails
      tokenRepository - the PasswordResetTokenRepository for password reset tokens, used to find users by token and delete tokens
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if mailSender or tokenRepository is null

    • PasswordResetService

      public PasswordResetService()
      Default constructor for PasswordResetService.

  • Method Details

    • createPasswordResetTokenForUser

      public void createPasswordResetTokenForUser(User user, String token)
      Creates a password reset token for a given user. Saves the token to the token repository.
      Parameters:
      user - the user requesting a password reset
      token - the password reset token to be created
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if user or token is null

    • sendPasswordResetMail

      public void sendPasswordResetMail(String email, String token)
      Sends a password reset email to the specified email address. Email should be valid and registered to a user.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user requesting a password reset
      token - the password reset token to be sent with email

    • validatePasswordResetToken

      public boolean validatePasswordResetToken(String token)
      Validates a password reset token. Checks if the token is found in the token repository and if the token is expired.
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise

    • getUserByValidatedPasswordResetToken

      public User getUserByValidatedPasswordResetToken(String token)
      Retrieves the user associated with a valid password reset token.
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token
      Returns:
      the User associated with the given token, or null if the token is invalid

    • deletePasswordResetToken

      public void deletePasswordResetToken(String token)
      Deletes a password reset token registered for a user. This function should be called after a user has successfully reset their password.
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token to be deleted. Should be valid.
